basics.label: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT SPECIALIST/AE
basics.summary: An exceptionally creative and results-driven marketing professional with over 20 years of successful experience covering the entire gamut of the industry. Extremely adept at all levels of communication; work extremely well independently or as part of a group, while possessing strong supervisory, organizational and staff management skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Develop new business and manage existing accounts for #1-rated KESQ-TV / kesq.com. Maintain relationships and service new and existing advertisers; continue / increase KESQ spending levels.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for all aspects of company branding, marketing, promotions and advertising.
highlights: average ticket 16% and increased vendor co-op payments over 600% in first 18 months.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide creative marketing / communications solutions and strategies from concept to final production (through distribution).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conceptualized, wrote, designed, and produced advertising and marketing campaigns and materials for the entire company.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for the writing, editing, graphic design and production of university catalogs, ads, academic books, professional journals, direct mail campaigns, annual reports, newsletters.
